duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the Non-Financial Regulatory Reporting (NFRR) Change Management program to enhance report preparation capabilities and reduce risk.
Work with stakeholders to prioritize and implement initiatives driven by business, legal, regulatory, compliance, or market requirements.
Deliver projects to plan and on budget, ensuring accuracy and completeness of NFRR reporting and adherence to data policies & standards.
Assess ill-defined problems and propose necessary tasks and deliverables to achieve desired outcomes.
Engage with stakeholders at different levels, managing and communicating effectively throughout the project lifecycle.
Design and map operational processes within Global Banking / Markets, ensuring compliance with Non-Financial Regulatory Reporting or similar regulatory mandates.
Bring new thoughts and ideas to drive innovation and unique solutions, challenging the status quo and promoting positive change.
Connect with a diverse set of clients to understand future business needs, continuously learning and striving to advance tools, technology, and ways of working.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Project Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
